title: [L2M] - Order Decomposition NEW ACQ - Implement MAPI Integrations for Catalog, Offering Qualifications and Shopping Cart - 2
description:
Description
As part of LOM to M-API transition the current processing of Product selection , augmentation, qualification and communicating these with Shopping cart should be transformed to use M-APIs.
acceptance_criteria: The Offering ID contains the Access Material number as well as ISP Material Number as per the designed nomenclature
The Tariff Offerings, addon Offering & Prices are fetched using M-API
Configuration can be synced with Shopping Cart
Order can be sent to EOS for enriching
Enriched Orders can be received from EOS
POQ validations can be executed via M-API
